flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Are you sick of taking apart your Computer and Laptop bringing it to a repair shop every time it needs service-only to wait a long time to get it back? Our trusted home computer repair technicians will come directly to your home or office to solve your computer troubles right on-the-spot. Simply call us to select an appointment time to fit your schedule. We offer same day service in most area in Dhaka.

 Computer Repairing and Upgrade.

 Data Recovery.

 Virus and Spyware Removal.

 Computer Tune-Up.

 Operating System Restoration.

 New and Used Computer Setup.

 Data Migration from old Computer to New Computer.

 Computer Sales and Service.

 Monthly Computer Maintenance Service.

Mithee IT takes the hassle out of computer repair. We’ll schedule a visit to your home (same-day service in most areas in Dhaka!), diagnose your problem, fix the issue, and test it thoroughly to make sure your system is running smoothly.

Thank you and best regards,

Yameen Ahamed

Mithee IT

Dhaka

Fax 8802-9346522

mitheeitemail@gmail.com
